TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Stack extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ICloneable
Public Class Stack Implements ICloneable, ICollection
public ref class Stack : ICloneable, System::Collections::ICollection
type Stack = class interface ICollection interface ICloneable interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示对象的简单后进先出 (LIFO) 非泛型集合。

span.span: Represents a simple last-in-first-out (LIFO) non-generic collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合的泛型版本，请参阅。For the generic version of this collection, see . 容量是元素数目可以容纳。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 如果是在堆栈的容量小于是 o （1） 操作。If is less than the capacity of the stack, is an O(1) operation. 如果需要增加以容纳新元素，容量会成为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 是 o （1） 的操作。 is an O(1) operation. 接受`null`为有效的值，并允许重复元素。 accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建并将值添加到以及如何显示它的值。The following example shows how to create and add values to a and how to display its values. [!code-cpp[Classic Stack Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公共静态 (在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员是线程安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 若要保证的线程安全，必须通过返回的包装器完成所有操作方法。

span.span: To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该实例为空并且具有默认初始容量。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty and has the default initial capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素数目的可以容纳。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 元素添加到，自动增加容量所要求的重新分配内部数组。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需要执行多个大小调整操作，同时将元素添加到。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that contains elements copied from the specified collection and has the same initial capacity as the number of elements copied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素数目的可以容纳。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 元素添加到，自动增加容量所要求的重新分配内部数组。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需要执行多个大小调整操作，同时将元素添加到。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 将元素复制到读取的相同顺序的。The elements are copied onto the in the same order they are read by the of the . 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数`col`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `col`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素数目的可以容纳。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 元素添加到，自动增加容量所要求的重新分配内部数组。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需要执行多个大小调整操作，同时将元素添加到。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`initialCapacity`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `initialCapacity`.

Public Overridable Function Clone () As Object
abstract member Clone : unit -> obj override this.Clone : unit -> obj

span.span: Creates a shallow copy of the .
A shallow copy of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合的浅表副本仅复制元素的集合，无论它们是引用类型还是值类型，但它不会复制所引用的对象。A shallow copy of a collection copies only the elements of the collection, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to. 新集合中的引用都指向相同原始集合中的引用指向的对象。The references in the new collection point to the same objects that the references in the original collection point to. 与此相反，集合的深层副本复制这些元素以及由这些元素直接或间接引用的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

span.span: , if is found in the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通过调用来确定相等性方法。This method determines equality by calling the method. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法测试是否相等通过传递`obj`自变量集合中的单个对象的方法。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method tests for equality by passing the `obj` argument to the method of individual objects in the collection. 在.NET Framework 早期版本，通过将各个项传递到集合中进行此判断方法的`obj`参数。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using passing the individual items in the collection to the method of the `obj` argument.

summary.span: 获取 中包含的元素数。

span.span: Gets the number of elements contained in the .
The number of elements contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素数目的可以存储。The capacity is the number of elements that the can store. 是中的实际的元素数目。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 容量始终是大于或等于。The capacity is always greater than or equal to . 如果添加元素时超过容量，通过将内部数组重新调整复制旧元素和添加新元素之前自动增加容量。If exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator
abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator

span.span: Returns an for the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要保证的线程安全，必须通过返回的包装器完成所有操作方法。To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何同步，确定是否同步的以及如何使用同步。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized, and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已经等于容量的容量自动重新分配内部数组中，增加和现有元素之前添加新元素将复制到新数组。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. `null` 可以推送到作为占位符，如有需要。`null` can be pushed onto the as a placeholder, if needed. 它占用堆栈中的槽，并且都被视为任何对象。It occupies a slot in the stack and is treated like any object. 如果是在堆栈的容量小于是 o （1） 操作。If is less than the capacity of the stack, is an O(1) operation. 如果需要增加以容纳新元素，容量会成为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将元素添加到，删除中的元素，或查看该元素的顶部。The following example shows how to add elements to the , remove elements from the , or view the element at the top of the . span.span: Returns a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for the .
A synchronized wrapper around the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要保证的线程安全，必须通过此包装器完成所有操作。To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through this wrapper. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何同步，确定是否同步的以及如何使用同步。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized, and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

public: virtual property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用于同步对 的访问的 。

span.span: An that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建的同步的版本，使用方法。To create a synchronized version of the , use the method. 但是，派生的类可以提供其自己的同步的版本使用属性。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步代码必须在执行操作的，而不是直接在。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它维护与其他线程可能同时对修改的正确同步对象。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

summary.span: 将 复制到新数组中。

span.span: Copies the to a new array.

returns.span: 新数组，包含 的元素的副本。

span.span: A new array containing copies of the elements of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将元素复制到数组中先出 (LIFO) 顺序，由一系列调用返回的元素的顺序类似。The elements are copied onto the array in last-in-first-out (LIFO) order, similar to the order of the elements returned by a succession of calls to . 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将复制到一维数组。The following example shows how to copy a into a one-dimensional array. [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.CopyTo Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.CopyTo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.CopyTo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
